name: V_EHI_PTS_PB_TX_SET
description: This view filters out premium billing payment data that is not appropriate for member level EHI exports when group billing is used.

columns.name: PB_TXSET_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the premium billing transaction set.

columns.name: TX_SET_TOTAL
columns.description: Total amount of outstanding transactions to be closed in the transaction set.

columns.name: TOTAL_CREDIT
columns.description: Total credits for the transaction set.

columns.name: NET_EXCEPT
columns.description: Amount for net exceptions from the transaction set.

columns.name: NET_DIFF
columns.description: Net difference for the transaction set. This represents the amount that still needs to be balanced in the transaction set.

columns.name: BAL_FWD_AMT
columns.description: Balance forward amount for the transaction set.

columns.name: ADJ_AMOUNT
columns.description: This field stores the total adjustment amount for this transaction set.
